channel.title: CVE Feed for SoundCloud Inc. -- SoundCloud Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SoundCloud Inc. -- SoundCloud Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2023-34018|2023-11-30T17:01:49.611Z -- soundcloud%20inc. -- soundcloud%20shortcode
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SoundCloud Inc. SoundCloud Shortcode allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SoundCloud Shortcode: from n/a through 3.1.0.
